title: Rich Eisen & No no no don't do that!
itunes:title: Rich Eisen & No no no don't do that!
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal bring you all of the latest news in the NFL. First, Rich Eisen joins the show to preview the draft and his annual 40-yard dash benefiting the relationship between St. Jude Children's Research Hospital and NFL PLAY 60: Run Rich Run. Rich also sits in to discuss the Deebo Samuel trade request and a wild NFL offseason. There is "zero chance" Steve Keim trades Kyler Murray, and A.J. Brown is holding out of voluntary workouts hoping for a new contract. Then, the heroes run through draft scenarios that make them say, "No, no, no, don't do that!"

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
